skillTree.name: Hates Tzeentch
skillTree.description: The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.name: Bloated Carcass
skillTree.description: Anything fired at this vile Nurglish servant's immense girth must penetrate many folds of sweaty fat before they even have the slightest chance of piercing his flesh.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Chaos Chariot (Mount)
skillTree.description: The dread carriages of the Ruinous hosts are more than just machines of war; they are symbols of status and power.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Infernal Champion
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Tainted Regeneration
skillTree.description: So blessed is this champion with Nurgle’s foetid restorative powers that his body heals itself as fast as his enemies can harm him.

skillTree.name: Dolorous Knell
skillTree.description: Those exposed to the aural shock waves of the Dolorous Knell are sent reeling, clutching their skulls in agony as infected pus leaks from their ears and eyes, and a plague of panic and terror spreads like wildfire through their ranks.

skillTree.name: Arch Contaminator
skillTree.description: Such are this Warlord’s virulent emanations that his very presence isenough to make even the most lethal toxins and venoms deadlier still.

skillTree.name: Fire Fever
skillTree.description: Empyric fever-heat burns through the champion’s brain, causing it to atttack with ever more frenzied ferocity.

skillTree.name: Living Plague
skillTree.description: Saturated as he is with Nurgle’s contagious blessings, merely to stand before this champion is to be assailed by an oppressive aura of plague.

skillTree.name: Grandfather's Blessing
skillTree.description: Nurgle is eager to bestow daemonic fecundity upon his faithful servants, sealing their gaping wounds with pulsating growths and replacing their spilt blood with curdling ichor.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Hulking Physique
skillTree.description: The Watcher´s body has become swollen with Nurgle’s divine blessings, and stands all but inviolate as a veritable behemoth of rancid flesh.

skillTree.name: Mutant Strain
skillTree.description: Unholy diseases warp and mutate, sending their carriers into a froth-jawed killing fever to the ruin of all.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +4 for Tribesmen, Marauders, Riders, Infected, and Warhounds units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +6% for Tribesmen, Marauders, Riders, Infected, and Warhounds units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for Tribesmen, Marauders, Riders, Infected, and Warhounds units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +8% for Tribesmen, Marauders, Riders, Infected, and Warhounds units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +8 for Tribesmen, Marauders, Riders, Infected, and Warhounds units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +10% for Tribesmen, Marauders, Riders, Infected, and Warhounds units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Life Eater
skillTree.description: A strain of the daemonic life-eater phage infests these warriors’ blades, aggressively reducing all it touches to drizzling filth and bubbling sludge.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +5 for Chaos Warriors, Plague Warriors, Plaguebearers, Pestigors, and Chaos Knights of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Chaos Warriors, Plague Warriors, Plaguebearers, Pestigors, and Chaos Knights of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +7 for Chaos Warriors, Plague Warriors, Plaguebearers, Pestigors, and Chaos Knights of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for Chaos Warriors, Plague Warriors, Plaguebearers, Pestigors, and Chaos Knights of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +9 for Chaos Warriors, Plague Warriors, Plaguebearers, Pestigors, and Chaos Knights of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Chaos Warriors, Plague Warriors, Plaguebearers, Pestigors, and Chaos Knights of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Putrescent Vitality
skillTree.description: Rancorous energies surge through Nurgle’s followers, bloating their distended bodies further with fresh infections and granting them new strength.

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +6 for Nurglings, Furies, Plague Toads, Rot Flies, Beasts of Nurgle, and Forsaken units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +4 for Nurglings, Furies, Plague Toads, Rot Flies, Beasts of Nurgle, and Forsaken units

Speed: +10% for Nurglings, Furies, Plague Toads, Rot Flies, Beasts of Nurgle, and Forsaken units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unrelenting Advance
skillTree.description: No matter how much fire the foe pours into these indomitable warriors, it is never enough...

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +4 for Chariots, Plague Drones, Pox Riders, and Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Resistance: +5% for Chariots, Plague Drones, Pox Riders, and Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for Chariots, Plague Drones, Pox Riders, and Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Resistance: +15% for Chariots, Plague Drones, Pox Riders, and Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +7% for Chariots, Plague Drones, Pox Riders, and Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Contaminated Monstrosity
skillTree.description: Whether a seething flesh-hulk or blighted war engine, this foul horror pulsates with unclean fecundity.

effects.description:
Physical Resistance: +6% for Spawn of Nurgle, Warshrine of Nurgle, Tainted Ogres, Plague Ogres, and Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +5% for Spawn of Nurgle, Warshrine of Nurgle, Tainted Ogres, Plague Ogres, and Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +10% for Spawn of Nurgle, Warshrine of Nurgle, Tainted Ogres, Plague Ogres, and Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Spawn of Nurgle, Warshrine of Nurgle, Tainted Ogres, Plague Ogres, and Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gifts of Decay
skillTree.description: Nurgle is a generous god, and through worship and devotion his followers can gain mighty rewards. Those who prove themselves most worthy wield suppurating weapons of unspeakable foulness, or gird themselves in weeping armour of filth.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Chosen, Aspiring Champions, Manreapers, Great Unclean Ones, and Chosen Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +5% for Chosen, Aspiring Champions, Manreapers, Great Unclean Ones, and Chosen Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Chosen, Aspiring Champions, Manreapers, Great Unclean Ones, and Chosen Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Chosen, Aspiring Champions, Manreapers, Great Unclean Ones, and Chosen Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Chosen, Aspiring Champions, Manreapers, Great Unclean Ones, and Chosen Plague Knights units
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Will spread to enemies within the Spread Range metres of affected unit

skillTree.name: Virulent Contagion
skillTree.description: Sickness so vile that it strikes as true and as hard as the perfect sword-blow.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Forsaken of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warshrine and Forsaken of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle, Chaos Warshrine and Forsaken of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cankerous Spread
skillTree.description: The corrosive ooze emanating from the most ulcerous sores is one of the most effective weapons in the Urfather's foul armoury.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Pox Riders of Nurgle, Plague Toads of Nurgle, Warhounds, Chaos Knights, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Chariots and Spawn of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Pox Riders of Nurgle, Plague Toads of Nurgle, Chaos Knights, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariots and Spawn of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Pox Riders of Nurgle, Plague Toads of Nurgle, Warhounds, Chaos Knights, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Chariots and Spawn of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Airborne Agues
skillTree.description: The air most creatures breathe provides just another avenue of attack for Nurgle and his many and varied contagions.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Putrid Resistance
skillTree.description: Blade and point and spell can be turned aside very easily by the Fly Lord's most-favoured servants.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +7 for Beast of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle, Soul Grinder and Great Unclean One units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for Beast of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle, Soul Grinder and Great Unclean One units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Beast of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle, Soul Grinder and Great Unclean One units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Will spread to enemies within the Spread Range metres of affected unit

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +12%

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Blessed by Blight
skillTree.description: Just as all life is born, so it must wither and die. Before that happens comes disease, in all its disgusting, filth-ridden glory.

skillTree.name: Relentless Advance
skillTree.description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pestilential Spawnings
skillTree.description: Those corrupted by Nurgle's rot flock to his putrid banner in the hope that they will be reborn anew in Grandfather's image.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Contagious
backgroundSkills.description: If you spend almost any time too close to this vile infector you'll regret it, assuming you live to tell the tale that is.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: +8%
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fomenter
backgroundSkills.description: Unusually subtle for one so foul, this one is skilled in spreading Nurgle's insanitary ways and words across the land.

backgroundSkills.name: Repellent
backgroundSkills.description: This one finds the enemy can barely stand to come near them, let alone attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Scabrous
backgroundSkills.description: When this one's countless lesions and warts finish weeping and harden up, a natural, protective carapace is left behind in their place.

backgroundSkills.name: Infectious
backgroundSkills.description: If a population are confined to their toilets or beds at home they're not able to spread dissent and sedition as readily, if at all.

backgroundSkills.name: Corpulent
backgroundSkills.description: Ogres aside, being this large and ungainly would almost certainly kill most other creatures, but when you're beloved of the Urfather it is actually an advantage.
